org.springframework.xd.analytics.ml.pmml

Class ResourcePmmlLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.xd.analytics.ml.pmml.AbstractPmmlLoader
      • org.springframework.xd.analytics.ml.pmml.ResourcePmmlLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PmmlLoader

    public class ResourcePmmlLoader
extends AbstractPmmlLoader
    An AbstractPmmlLoader that can load PMML documents from a modelLocation given as resource URI.
